start_dialogue: ^Alright, need to make beef curry for today
^Let’s see what’s in here… onions, garlic… ah, still got some potatoes
^Aiyoh, no carrots… and need cardamom too – can’t forget that, otherwise, no fragrance
^And beef chuck! How can make beef curry without beef, Ah Mui?
^Must be getting blur, better go to the market and get what’s missing
^And need to remember to take my meds
